org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.ca.asm

Class AbstractAsmContigBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.ca.asm.AbstractAsmContigBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsmContigVisitor

    public abstract class AbstractAsmContigBuilder
extends Object
implements AsmContigVisitor
    AbstractAsmContigBuilder is a AsmContigVisitor that will populate an AsmContigBuilder instance when its visit methods are called.
    Author:
    dkatzel

    • Method Detail

      • visitVariance

        public void visitVariance(Range range,
                          long numberOfSpanningReads,
                          long anchorSize,
                          long internalAccessionId,
                          long accessionForPhasedVariant,
                          SortedSet<AsmContigVisitor.VariantRecord> variantRecords)
        Ignored by default. This method may be overridden to handle variant records (example, de-phasing diploid sequence by collecting all the linked variants and modifying the builder as a post process.

        A Variance message indicates alternative sequence(s) for small regions of the contig consensus. A variant whose sequence length is 1 is commonly known as a SNP.

        Specified by:
        visitVariance in interface AsmContigVisitor
        Parameters:
        range - the location of this variant on the contig consensus sequence.
        numberOfSpanningReads - the number of reads that give coverage at the variant positions. Some spanning reads may not have contributed to the consensus due to poor quality or lack of confirmation in the other reads.
        anchorSize - Ancor size used to detect variants, Currently, Celera Assembler defaults to 11.
        internalAccessionId - the internal accession id of this variant.
        accessionForPhasedVariant - the accession for a different variant that is phased with this one. If set to a negative number, then this variant has not related to another variant? Linking all the variants that are phased with one another can be used to dephase mixed (or diploid?) sequence.
        variantRecords - a list of AsmContigVisitor.VariantRecord objects that explain all the details of each part of the SNP.

      • visitReadLayout

        public void visitReadLayout(char readType,
                            String externalReadId,
                            DirectedRange readRange,
                            List<Integer> gapOffsets)
        Description copied from interface: AsmContigVisitor
        Visit one read layout onto the the current contig.
        Specified by:
        visitReadLayout in interface AsmContigVisitor
        Parameters:
        readType - the type of the read, usually 'R' for random read. This is the same type as from the frg file.
        externalReadId - the read id.
        readRange - the DirectedRange which has the gapped range on the contig that this read aligns to and the Direction of the read on this contig.
        gapOffsets - the gap offsets of this read onto the frg sequence.

      • visitUnitigLayout

        public void visitUnitigLayout(AsmVisitor.UnitigLayoutType type,
                              String unitigExternalId,
                              DirectedRange unitigRange,
                              List<Long> gapOffsets)
        Ignored by default since this class only works with contig data. Visit one unitig layout onto the the current contig.
        Specified by:
        visitUnitigLayout in interface AsmContigVisitor
        Parameters:
        type - the AsmVisitor.UnitigLayoutType that explains why the unitig is layed out here.
        unitigExternalId - the external id of this unitig.
        unitigRange - the gapped DirectedRange on the contig that this unitig aligns to in the Direction of the unitig on the contig. If direction is Direction.REVERSE, then the contig uses the reverse complement of the unitig's consensus sequence.
        gapOffsets - the gap offsets of this layed out unitig onto the unitig consensus sequence (after reverse complementing?).
